entries.description: Delve debugger installation fails for Go Lambdas on MacOS
restored `Connect to AWS` command (alias to the `Choose AWS Profile` command)
CodeWhisperer: when pressing up or down does not move cursor when suggestion is active
CodeWhisperer access token validation may sometimes fail
"Connect to AWS" does not handle missing credentials file
basic syntax highlighting for ~/.aws/credentials and ~/.aws/config files
`Choose AWS Profile` quickpick now includes an `Edit Credentials` action
Add `Edit Credentials` command which opens all known credential files
CodeWhisperer: References include a link to the source repository if possible.
Auto-connect tries a maximum of one non-default profile instead of three
